articles.title: Hugging Face’s chief science officer worries AI is becoming ‘yes-men on servers’ - TechCrunch
articles.description: Hugging Face co-founder and chief science officer Thomas Wolf thinks that AI today isn't capable of figuring out novel solutions like a human.
